content.label: Awesome game please update the game for bigger screen,i bout this game special for playing on iphone max,but need screen resolution ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
This desperately needs an update for modern iPhones!  Make it full screen & take advantage of the GPU/CPU to smooth the game out.

Just bought and downloaded this for my IPad Pro 12‚Äô and am very displeased. Got through the tutorial just fine. Got to the first mission afterward and none of my troops can get beyond targeting the enemy. Can‚Äôt shoot. I press ‚ÄúAccept‚Äù repeatedly, i hear the sound to acknowledge that I tapped the button but nothing happens. The game.is.broken.

So normally the game is great I love playing and would normally play it all day but I have an issue. So I load up the game I go to campaign select click on my campaign with like 72 hours of play and I try to load it and it exits me out of the game I try to restart the app still doesn‚Äôt work, I restart my phone still doesn‚Äôt work, so I load a different campaign that I‚Äôve hardly played and it works, I don‚Äôt know what the problem is but it‚Äôs irritating not being able to play something I payed for, thank you for reading, please fix this.

title.label: Extremely Dissapointing - don‚Äôt buy unless you want to be angry.

content.label: After investing HOURS into this game, the Xcom base is attacked and I can‚Äôt use SHIVS, which I‚Äôve based most of my later game playing strategy on. Why have them in the game if you can‚Äôt utilize them at the most critical moment??? So now I lose the game because I can‚Äôt utilize a strategy with is PART OF THE GAME.  And then the iCloud backup doesn‚Äôt work.  Truly F***ing frustrating.

This is a must play for any fans of tactical games. A couple bugs significantly dampened the experience though. I went through two save files trying to upgrade a MEC, but was never given access to anything beyond the un-upgraded MEC-1. Tons of fun and dozens of hours of fantastic gameplay, but being locked out of some of the game‚Äôs coolest content was very disappointing.

28th Feb 2020
iPad Pro 3rd gen iOS 12.4.1

Still works great for a game that hasn‚Äôt seen any updates for over two years.

However it seems to suffer from some graphical issues, nothing major and doesn‚Äôt really interfere with gameplay so can over look it.

I‚Äôve put a lot of hours into this game, so def got my monies worth. However I just experienced my first major issue in years. I was at mission control, counting away the days to progress the game and it crashes back to the home screen. No way to get around it. Months of game play lost (playing second wave). Had to start again, so that was a bummer.

Not sure what this game will run like on iOS 13, hopefully it gets updated for fix these small bugs others have been mentioning in the reviews.

The second mission in the game contains a game stopping bug. It‚Äôs a tutorial, so the game will not release control of the characters to players and it requires you to move a character to a spot it cannot reach.  It‚Äôll just hang and beep at you as you try to pick the spot and can only select the grid next to where it wants you to be.  Otherwise plays much like the PC game, for the one mission I got to play.  Disappointing as heck.

It‚Äôs XCOM. On your phone. It‚Äôs a perfect little time killer throughout the day, as the game picks right back up where you left it as long as you don‚Äôt completely terminate the app.

My one and only gripe about this port is the camera. Please, for the love of the Council, add more camera options. The current sensitivity gives me Tinder flashbacks with all the swiping that‚Äôs required to move it in any meaningful way. I want to be able to drag the camera at a speed and distance that matches my finger‚Äôs movement. And I‚Äôd like an option that allows me to keep the camera zoomed out when I switch soldiers or end one‚Äôs turn. Constantly zooming the camera out before moving soldiers is bothersome.

These little improvements would greatly increase what is already a stellar experience.
Don‚Äôt buy this game. There are numerous issues with it on any iPhone newer than the 8 and I personally have been denied a refund. The issues range from game breaking to annoying.

Had to request a refund. Constantly gets stuck and requires force close. Currently cannot get past first mission as tooltip says to attack an enemy but character out of range (across the map). Cannot switch characters, close the ‚Äúselect target‚Äù mode (as no target available), or attack a target (again, none in range). 

Poor mobile port. Avoid. iPhone 11 Pro.

The port is amazing but could the devs please fix the way the audio works on IOS? When you turn all the channels to zero and even disable soldier speech the game will not let you play your own music/audio in the background. Now the Enemy Unknown soundtrack is amazing but its still an issue if turning the audio down still won't turn it 'off' per say.
Please allow more options with camera, automatic zooming on characters is annoying, and need to be able to zoom camera further out to be able to see which direction to go.

title.label: Regret to purchase this game for my iPad Pro :(

content.label:
The graphic isn‚Äôt enhanced or any good, and what bugged me the most is there are too many bugs that prevent me from playing it. For example, in the second act (where you can choose between North America or Shanghai, I chose NA), my soldier can‚Äôt do anything in a sudden in the middle of the mission. I pressed ‚Äúaccept‚Äù so many time shut it just nothing happens. I can‚Äôt switch to any other soldier too, basically I just stuck there.

Please fix this!
Needs iPhone XR support
The game doesn‚Äôt feel feeling
Amazing game but please update for iPad Pro. Only for this 4 stars =)
Great value. Works on my iPhone 11 with no issues.

5 star game, 4 star issue with iPad Pro.

I have really enjoyed this game - it is a faithful port and has worked quite well on my IPad Pro.... until the final boss battle with the Uber Ethereal. The game will not display anything beyond the last door into the last chamber... as such, I can‚Äôt enter, engage in battle, and save (or fail to save) Earth. Bummer ... the other 40 hours of play have been amazing, however. Well worth the fun if you are playing on another device.

Thanks, 2K, for creating and (re)releasing a phenomenal game.
This game is amazing but I only wish that there was modeling that could be done with it for the single player campaign for fun.

I absolutely loved this game for the PS3 back in the day.  While it is still the essence of that great game, the difficulty of this version is completely unfair and out of whack. I was accustomed to playing this game on normal difficulty and up for PS3 so I was clearly familiar with strategies and tactics for success.  In this version the percentage plays are totally stacked against you.  Thinking this might have just been a subjective bias, I proceeded to reload one specific engagement 25 times on the Easy difficulty setting. My soldier was 56% to hit the target, the final result was a 2/25 success rate. Obviously a limited sample size but it confirmed what I had been suspecting.  Not to mention over watch is rarely successful and the enemy‚Äôs hit rate is through the roof. It‚Äôs such a shame because this is one of my favorite games and it runs very smoothly on an iPad, yet I constantly find myself frustrated at an enemy that is nearly unbeatable even on the easy difficulty setting.

Basic functionality issue. I bought this game 2 years ago and the elevate up/down commands stopped working. I redownloaded it yesterday to see if this issue had been fixed on iPad. It has not. Soldiers get stuck on top of buildings, rendering the game completely unplayable. Pretty pathetic.

title.label: Great on PC, middling on iPad

content.label: The iPad port of XCOM has the unfortunate tendency to aggravate all of the minor problems from PC. Aiming explosives is a nightmare and can ruin your whole game with one misclick. I wish I could disable the double click which has caused many movement errors as well. And the cut scenes are a time consuming annoyance on the iPad.
It‚Äôs just not playable. I‚Äôm halfway through the third mission and the game keeps crashing. Save your money.

title.label: Keeps crashing on iPhone 11 Pro Max

content.label: As stated above, I can‚Äôt even play it on my iPhone. Very disappointed as the game itself is awesome.

title.label: Crashes on title screen after 1st save

content.label:
Gameplay is truly fun. First dip into the xcom universe, and really enjoying it.

Sure, it‚Äôs a nightmare trying to climb stairs in the game, and camera mechanics get a bit wonky sometimes. 

That said, on an iPhone 8 after the initial play through and a save, the game crashes out about .5 seconds into the title screen, after the opening bits play.

Deleting and reinstalling the app returns stability, but only for one play, without the immediate ability to retrieve your cloud save. (And I‚Äôve done this a few times because I‚Äôve enjoyed the game then I can play it so much.)

It‚Äôs a real shame.

0 stars rating from me. Trash tbh. Crazy dumb bugs and crashes in single player and multiplayer. Don‚Äôt expect to get any kinda support on any of your issues either.

HOW CAN I GET A REFUND FOR THIS TRASH

title.label: Will not allow me to manufacture anything!

content.label: There is apparently a glitch that doesn‚Äôt allow me to manufacture anything I‚Äôve researched!! Fix this and I‚Äôll gladly upgrade my rating.

title.label: Critical bugs ruined port of great game

content.label: Some critical bugs ruined this port of one of the best games of all time.  I frequently encountered bugs where I could not switch between guys or I could move or shoot.  The bugs made it super frustrating and eventually unplayable and I finally gave up.  It‚Äôs a shame because I played this game a ton on PC and it was one of my favorites.  Do not buy this game until you see they‚Äôve fixed these bugs (written 11/28/2019).
Constant issues, game freezes, have had to go back to old saves multiple times because of an error or the game refusing to trigger events REQUIRED by the level.

Normal difficulty is too easy and I get bored one hitting everything to death. Put it on classic and it just becomes frustrating. The aliens can critically hit you from any angle and any distance while you, with a 98% hit expectancy miss every time. I cannot level up my characters because they die in one hit from across the map while in full cover!

Too many video cut scenes. I want to play this game, not watch a plane fly back and fourth in three different cut scenes. Some cut scenes can be skipped while others cannot. I do not really care about getting saluted for giving a medal. Why can I not skip that cinematic?

title.label: Best tactical strategy game - w/ some bugs

content.label: I grew up on XCOM, and this version is clearly a leap forward from the original. Brilliant execution. Two things...one, please port all of the XCOM games to iOS. 2. There is a bug in the multiplayer - if you pause a multiplayer game and attempt to return, it crashes. Please have a look, introducing the multiplayer was a fantastic upgrade...but there remain some bugs to iron out.

One of the best strategy games I have played
I have the game on PlayStation as well

If you played the original, or XCom 2 for the PC this will not disappoint. The story line for this is between XCom and XCom 2. If you have never played an XCom game before start here.
The story in the game is very engaging
Can you make it for iPhone X i can‚Äôt enjoy the game if it‚Äôs only a small screen. Please fix it.
This game is 100% worth the price.  This is a must have game on iOS It is perfect for the iPad.  This is my first review ever in 9 years so this must mean a lot.

When I got this game it was so fun at first then I noticed the operators can't aim at anything you will be 2 feet away from an alien and the your guy aims at the ceiling it makes me so angry when someone gets shot two times and doesn‚Äôt die.

I love XCOM but playing on an XR and with the latest iOS, I am finding it buggy to the point of being unplayable. I am on the second mission and have found that I cannot move a solider or get him to do anything. All
Moves show up read, none of the weapons will confirm, and when I click to activate my gun, it locks me in a targeting tutorial. I wish I hadn‚Äôt spent money on this game. I literally can‚Äôt play it.

I was so excited to play this game as I was a huge fan of xcom 2 on my Xbox one but man I can‚Äôt even get past the first level after the tutorial because of the buggy controls. My main complaint is the cursor elevation simply does now work. My touch screen doesn‚Äôt recognize the command (two fingers swiping or pulling down) and I end up sitting a swiping for 5 minutes trying to get my soldier to either climb up or climb down from his post. It‚Äôs really disheartening since I was eager to play it on my new phone and have a genuine console style game that I could play while having downtime offshore.

There are a few minor issues, some glitches at times but overall this is a very fun game, especially if you liked the original XCOM game. I really hope there is a second one eventually. I love the XCOM series.
the second mission is unplayable. what an awful port.
You need to update the game please no reason why it‚Äôs not optimized for iPhone XS, haven‚Äôt seen an update in over a year I‚Äôm done lol delete

Initially I‚Äôll say gaming was fun.  I‚Äôve managed to accumulate quite a few hours and suddenly today- mind you, no updates have been done- the game is crashing.  Can‚Äôt get past the title and movie screen prior to selecting to continue game.  ....am not a happy camper.

title.label: Game has never worked for me across multiple devices

content.label: Try as I might this game never works.  I can maybe play the first mission then if I save I can never open it again.  I paid for both the older and this app.  It has never worked across any of my devices starting with an iPad Air 1 to now an iPad Pro 2.  I had iPhone 6 -7 and iPhone X didn‚Äôt work.  Didn‚Äôt work on my macs neither used to crash on the Game Center login.
This is a great port of the desktop version.

title.label: Needs a update. Great game overall!!

content.label: The game keeps taking me out of the app every time I‚Äôm playing a online multiplayer game and keeps counting my games as a loss please fix this.
Pure enjoyment!

title.label: Y‚Äôall Must Have Done Some Work

content.label: I bought this game practically the day it was released. I don‚Äôt know if y‚Äôall have been optimizing this over the years or what .. but loading (which was one of my only downsides) is practically nonexistent. Everything is so flawless. Love it.

Game files corrupt weekly, variety of bugs occur in most matches, camera system is broken, controls are almost unusable, design borders on broken (and is easily exploitable in multiplayer), balance is geared towards randomality: ensuring even the worst tactics win with regular frequency.  Looks cool.

TLDR: Don‚Äôt bother.

Just an excellent port of the game but it really needs two things:

1. iPhone X support for full display.
2. iCloud support for saved games to carry across devices. 

Those two fixes would easily make this a 5 star game.
